title: Whats up with the help and support Spam
body: Whats up with the help and support Spam?

replies.body: We're actively working to reduce the effectiveness of the spam and ultimately work to prevent it in the future. It's cleaned up for now, but be sure to use the report button if you see it so we're notified and can manage it. I'm sorry for the inconvenience, and hopefully we'll have some more positive updates in the future.
will do Wuks, i had another question would something like this effect my ability to connect to the client? as i ve been trying to since 12:30pm. Ive lodged a ticket with support

No, the Boards services and the live server services are two separate systems. Your connectivity issues may be ISP related or a product of the most recent patch. 

I would recommend going through the Troubleshooting Connection Issues Riot Games Support articles if your issues are persisting. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
